unsigned long long next_mask(unsigned long long c) {

    unsigned long long smallest = c & -c;

    unsigned long long ripple = c + smallest;

    unsigned long long ones = c ^ ripple;

    ones = (ones >> 2) / smallest;

    return ripple | ones;

}
